channel.title: Can you make eny weapon stand like a staff? + making bow projectiles?
channel.description: Well i just got dark bow to shoot like a bow and give exp and shoot from a distant. now i just need it to be a bow on Combat Tab "crossed sword's" Fixed both J-K and I_own__you thank's ---------------------------------------- Can you make eny weapon stand like a staff? like a god sword. cos in runescape there are blurite swords and they stand kind of like a staff. help if you can. And if you can't thank's for reading this topic to see if you can help. ---------------------------------------- projectiles for bows?

item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

vipersniper100:

do you know if you can Can you make eny weapon stand like a staff?

find

public int GetRunAnim(int id)

under add

if(id == 4675 || id == 84 || id == 772 || id == 1379 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 7648 || id == 1403 || id == 1405 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4862 || id == 4863 || id == 6563 || id == 4865 || id == 4866 || id == 6603 || id == 6726 || id == 6727 || id == 6526 || id == 4710 || id == 7639)//Staffs { return 1210; }

find

public int GetWalkAnim(int id)

under add

if(id == 4675 || id == 84 || id == 772 || id == 1379 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 7648 || id == 1403 || id == 1405 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4862 || id == 4863 || id == 6563 || id == 4865 || id == 4866 || id == 6603 || id == 6726 || id == 6727 || id == 6526 || id == 4710 || id == 7639)//Staffs { return 1146; }

find

public int GetStandAnim(int id)

under add

if(id == 4675 || id == 84 || id == 772 || id == 1379 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 7648 || id == 1403 || id == 1405 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4862 || id == 4863 || id == 6563 || id == 4865 || id == 4866 || id == 6603 || id == 6726 || id == 6727 || id == 6526 || id == 4710 || id == 7639)//Staffs { return 809; }

ID = weapon ids you can change if you like

P.s lookout this:

example:
public int GetWalkAnim(int id)

Dont add under the code’s

only under the {

or you get errors
